text: Kasone, ki on ciro Alloh taolo dar kitoʙi [Tavrot dar ʙorai nuʙuvvati Muhammad] nozil kardaast, kitmon mekunand va onro [ʙaroi kasʙi molu maqomi dunjo] ʙa ʙahoi andake mefurusand [dar haqiqat] cuz otas dar sikamhojason furu nameʙarand va Alloh taolo ruzi qijomat ʙo onon suxan namegujad va [az palidii gunoh] pokason namekunad va azoʙi dardnoke xohand dost
